item.title: work experience
item.description: You can download a .pdf version of my updated CV here Work experience (January 2021 - ) (full-time): Lab Manager at LingLab. Room G114, Universität Konstanz Universitätstraße 10 78464 Konstanz (January 2018 - September 2019): Psycholinguistics Laboratory Manager . Lab director: Dr Vera Hohaus. The University of Manchester. NG.15 Psycholinguistics Laboratory Samuel Alexander Building M13 9PL Manchester (April 2018 - September 2018): Research Assistant in the UMRI-funded project “Beauty is in the ear of
